fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
-Write someone’s name on your list
-Tear the list

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Anyone who’s name is written on your list is notified that they are on a list, getting the message, “You feel your identity has been taken note of”
-Your targets are unable to remove their name from the list
-When you tear the list, you and everyone else that is on the list will die to an unpreventable overkill attack
-If you die during the night, you automatically use your second ability
-You will not tear the list if you are hanged

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have at least 5 people, 3 of which must be Town or part of the majority “good” faction, on your list then tear
